ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT pi.id,pi.short_name,pi.goods_id,gi.name,pi.enabled, pi.update_time,cb.back_fee,cb.min_fee,cb.back_type,cb.data_tag FROM pm_info pi INNER JOIN pm_cash_back cb ON cb.id = pi.id INNER JOIN gs_goods gs ON gs.id = pi.goods_id INNER JOIN gs_item gi ON gi.id = gs.item_id WHERE pi.merchant_id={merchant_id} AND ({enabled}<0 OR pi.enabled={enabled}) AND (pi.short_name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR gi.name LIKE '%{keyword}') ORDER BY id limit {page_start},{page_size}
